title: Update regarding GigaTech Inc.
story_body:
GigaTech Inc. (GTX) reported its quarterly financial results at 08:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) today. 

For the period ended March 31, 2023, GigaTech Inc. (GTX) posted revenue of $2.5 billion, representing a 22% increase from the corresponding period in 2022, during which the company reported revenue of $2.05 billion. 

Sales growth was driven by a 30% increase in the company's high-performance computing segment, while its emerging technologies division saw a 15% rise in sales. 

On a year-over-year basis, GigaTech Inc. (GTX) reported a 25% increase in total sales, marking the company's eighth consecutive quarter of growth. 

As of 08:00 EDT, GigaTech Inc. (GTX) has not released forward-looking guidance for the upcoming quarter. The company's quarterly financial results are available on its investor relations website.
